original_text: They were looking for Jesus and saying to one another as they stood in the temple, “What do you think? That he will not come to the feast at all?”
korean_text: 그들이 예수를 찾으며 성전에 서서 서로 말하되 너희 생각에는 어떠하냐 그가 명절에 오지 아니하겠느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: as they stood in the temple
That he will not come to the feast at all?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 절기에 전혀 오지 않을 것이라고 생각하십니까?
